text: Is it normal for a new row being added to a HubDB table to remove a bunch of data?

ex: Partially populated table has 3 columns, 2 of which are filled for X number of rows... If I add data into the un-filled column in a few of those rows the data "saves" and gives me that little "All changes saved" confirmation text. If I then "Add" a column (any type) it will uncheck a whole bunch of booleans and remove the recently updated data.
